issue.title: polaris steering angle -> vehicle velocity bug

content.raw:
Hmm, it still rotated about 50 degrees over the course of 500 seconds with the max_vel fix and no robot inside the vehicle.

I tried running at 1e-4 instead of 1e-3 but the results were the same: http://youtu.be/n_MwQhlo0Eg
One collision is at the beginning of the video and a second one at the end of the video. The second collision even shows slippage to the side of the vehicle upon collision.
content.html:
Hmm, it still rotated about 50 degrees over the course of 500 seconds with the max_vel fix and no robot inside the vehicle.

I tried running at 1e-4 instead of 1e-3 but the results were the same: http://youtu.be/n_MwQhlo0Eg One collision is at the beginning of the video and a second one at the end of the video. The second collision even shows slippage to the side of the vehicle upon collision.
